wikipedia_page.main: Ian Butler (born 1 February 1944 in Darton, Barnsley) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League as a left winger for Rotherham United, Hull City, York City and Barnsley. His son, Martin Butler, also played for York City.

response: *Ian Butler, English professional footballer was born here.
*Ian Butler, former member of Tempest (Celtic rock band)

Martin Butler (born 3 March 1966) is an English former professional footballer who played as a striker in the Football League for York City, Aldershot, Exeter City, Carlisle United, Scunthorpe United and Scarborough and in non-League football for Macclesfield Town, North Ferriby United and Guiseley. His father, Ian Butler, also played for York City.
